Module de.unistuttgart.informatik.fius.jvk
Package de.unistuttgart.informatik.fius.jvk.provided

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unistuttgart.informatik.fius.jvk.provided.Game
  • public class Game
extends Object
    A helper to start a Simulation with a GameWindow.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Game​(String windowTitle)
      Create a new Simulation and GameWindow with the given window title.
      Game​(String windowTitle, Task task)
      Create a new Simulation and GameWindow with the given window title.
      Game​(String windowTitle, Task task, TaskVerifier verifier)
      Create a new Simulation with a TaskVerifier and GameWindow with the given window title.
      Game​(String windowTitle, TaskVerifier verifier)
      Create a new Simulation with a TaskVerifier and GameWindow with the given window title.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      GameWindow getGameWindow()
      Get the created GameWindow object.

      Get the created Simulation object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game​(String windowTitle)
        Create a new Simulation and GameWindow with the given window title.
        Parameters:
        windowTitle - the title of the game window

      • Game

        public Game​(String windowTitle,
            Task task)
        Create a new Simulation and GameWindow with the given window title.

        The task is run when the game is started with the run() command of the game.

        Parameters:
        windowTitle - the title of the game window
        task - the task to run on game start

      • Game

        public Game​(String windowTitle,
            TaskVerifier verifier)
        Create a new Simulation with a TaskVerifier and GameWindow with the given window title.
        Parameters:
        windowTitle - the title of the game window
        verifier - the verifier that checks if a task was solved correctly

      • Game

        public Game​(String windowTitle,
            Task task,
            TaskVerifier verifier)
        Create a new Simulation with a TaskVerifier and GameWindow with the given window title.

        The task is run when the game is started with the run() command of the game.

        Parameters:
        windowTitle - the title of the game window
        task - the task to run on game start
        verifier - the verifier that checks if a task was solved correctly
